text: Earthquake is a 1974 American adventure drama movie. It was directed by Mark Robson. Actors include Charlton Heston, Ava Gardner, George Kennedy, Walter Matthau, Genevi√®ve Bujold, Richard Roundtree, Lloyd Nolan, Lorne Greene, and Kip Niven. It was distributed by Universal Pictures. The movie was nominated for 4 Oscars at the Academy Awards in 1975. It won for Best Sound. It also received a Special Achievement Academy Award for Visual Effects. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1974 adventure movies Category:1974 drama movies Category:American disaster movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Mark Robson Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:Movies about earthquakes
title: Earthquake (movie)
